password_generator.title: Password Generator
password_generator.meta_description: Create strong, secure passwords with our free online password generator. Customizable length, character types, and advanced security options.
password_generator.click_generate: Click generate to create a password
password_generator.tip: Strong passwords use 12+ characters with mixed types
password_generator.select_at_least_one: Select at least one character type
password_generator.faq_q1: How secure is this password generator?
password_generator.faq_a1: Our generator uses cryptographically secure random number generation (crypto.getRandomValues) to create truly random passwords. All processing happens in your browser - no passwords are ever sent to our servers.
password_generator.faq_a2: A strong password is at least 12 characters long and includes a mix of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. Avoid using personal information or common words.
password_generator.faq_q3: Should I use different passwords for each account?
password_generator.faq_a3: Yes! Using unique passwords for each account ensures that if one password is compromised, your other accounts remain secure. Consider using a password manager to keep track of them.
